nodes.bodyText: This file is mostly existing code but is showing as new code since I renamed the file. The new code is what I duplicated to use behind the feature flag.
This will be converted to react as part of other story ?
Yes. I just created a PR for it #3775. That one should probably get merged before this one.
This is a copy of ListSearch so we can match the new design without having to have a bunch of if statements to check for the feature flag
We can use FlexWrap here as well
Optional: We can create a style object for button as its same (as of now)
Can you please point to the line number for this  condition : ' '?
is it !!searchContext ? if Yes can we just use && ?
Yep, that's it. I was thinking render needed to return something but works fine after changing.
